mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (title, category_id, start_date, end_date, description, type, max_participants, password, use_password, writer_id, status, goal_type, goal_value, participant_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{categoryId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description}, #{type}, #{maxParticipants}, #{password}, #{usePassword}, #{writerId}, #{status}, #{goalType}, #{goalValue}, #{participantCount})
INSERT INTO user_challenge (user_id, challenge_id, is_creator, is_completed, actual_value, is_success) VALUES (#{userId}, #{challengeId}, #{isCreator}, #{isCompleted}, #{actualValue}, #{isSuccess});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM challenge WHERE (#{type} IS NULL OR type = #{type}) AND (#{status} IS NULL OR status = #{status})
SELECT challenge_id FROM user_challenge WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT actual_value * 1.0 / goal_value FROM user_challenge uc JOIN challenge c ON uc.challenge_id = c.id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND uc.challenge_id = #{challengeId}
SELECT AVG(actual_value * 1.0 / c.goal_value) FROM user_challenge uc JOIN challenge c ON uc.challenge_id = c.id WHERE uc.challenge_id = #{challengeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_challenge WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user_challenge WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND challenge_id = #{challengeId}

SELECT u.id AS userId, us.nickname AS nickname, (uc.actual_value * 1.0 / c.goal_value) AS progress, a.avatar_image AS avatarImage FROM user_challenge uc JOIN user u ON uc.user_id = u.id JOIN user_status us ON u.id = us.id JOIN challenge c ON uc.challenge_id = c.id LEFT JOIN avatar a ON u.id = a.id WHERE uc.challenge_id = #{challengeId}
